universum.studios.android.device.storage

Class StorageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.device.storage.StorageUtils

  • public class StorageUtils
extends Object
    Simple utility class specifying API allowing to create, copy, move or delete files on the current Android device's file system.

    This class wraps instance of StorageEditor for all file content related operations, like deleting, copying and moving of file/directory content on the file system. Note, that all exceptions thrown by the editor need to be handled by a caller of the StorageUtils API itself.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Detail

      • fileExists

        public static boolean fileExists(@NonNull
                                 String path)
        Checks whether a file at the specified path on the file system exists or not.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the desired file to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given path points to file which at this time exists, false if there is no file at the given path or it is a directory.

      • directoryExists

        public static boolean directoryExists(@NonNull
                                      String path)
        Checks whether a directory at the specified path on the file system exists or not.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the desired directory to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given path points to directory which at this time exists, false if there is no directory at the given path or it is a file.

      • isDirectoryEmpty

        public static boolean isDirectoryEmpty(@NonNull
                                       String path)
        Checks whether a directory at the specified path contains any files/subdirectories or not.
        Parameters:
        path - Path of the desired directory to check.
        Returns:
        True if the given path points to directory which at this time exists and doesn't contains any files/subdirectories, false if it doesn't exists or if it is a file.

      • createFile

        public static boolean createFile(@NonNull
                                 String path)
        Creates a new empty File at the specified path on the file system.

        See File.createNewFile() for additional info.

        Parameters:
        path - Path of the desired file to be created.
        Returns:
        True if the requested file was successfully created or already exists, false if at the specified path already exists a directory with the same path or some IO error occurs.

      • createFiles

        public static int createFiles(@NonNull
                              String... paths)
        Same as createFiles(String, String...) with empty basePath.

      • createFiles

        public static int createFiles(@Nullable
                              String basePath,
                              @NonNull
                              String... paths)
        Creates all files at the given paths on the file system.

        This is a bulk operation for createFile(String) method, so the given paths will be looped to perform the requested action for each of them.

        Parameters:
        basePath - A path to be used as base for the given paths, in case when they represents a relative paths.
        paths - Paths of the desired files to be created.
        Returns:
        Count of the successfully created files.

      • createDirectory

        public static boolean createDirectory(@NonNull
                                      String path)
        Creates a new empty directory at the specified path on the file system.

        See File.mkdirs() for additional info.

        Parameters:
        path - Path of the desired directory to be created.
        Returns:
        True if the requested directory was successfully created or already exists, false if at the specified path already exists a file with the same path or some IO error occurs.

        Parameters:

      • deleteFile

        public static boolean deleteFile(@NonNull
                                 String path)
        Deletes a file at the specified path on the file system.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to the desired file to be deleted.
        Returns:
        True if the requested file was successfully deleted, false if it is actually a directory or it doesn't exists.

      • deleteDirectories

        public static int deleteDirectories(@Nullable
                                    FileFilter filter,
                                    @Nullable
                                    FilenameFilter nameFilter,
                                    @Nullable
                                    String basePath,
                                    @NonNull
                                    String... paths)
        Deletes all directories at the given paths on the file system.

        This is a bulk operation for deleteDirectory(FileFilter, FilenameFilter, String) method, so the given paths will be looped to perform the requested action for each of them.

        Parameters:
        basePath - A path to be used as base for the given paths, in case when they represents a relative paths.
        paths - Paths to the desired directories to be deleted.
        Returns:
        Count of the successfully deleted directories.

      • copyFile

        public static boolean copyFile(int flags,
                               @Nullable
                               String toPath,
                               @NonNull
                               String fromPath)
                        throws IOException
        Wrapped StorageEditor.copyFileContent(int, File, File) upon this utils editor instance.

        Note, that the given toPath will be appended with a last path segment obtained from the given fromPath.

        Parameters:
        toPath - The path to be used to create fromFile parameter for editor.
        fromPath - The path to be used to create toFile parameter for editor.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • copyFiles

                            @Nullable
                            String toPath,
                            @NonNull
                            String... fromPaths)
                     throws IOException
        Copies all files at the given fromPaths on the file system.

        This is a bulk operation for copyFile(int, String, String) method, so the given paths will be looped to perform the requested action for each of them.

        Parameters:
        fromPaths - Paths to the desired files to be copied.
        Returns:
        Count of the successfully copied files.
        Throws:
        IOException

        public static int copyDirectories(int flags,
                                  @Nullable

                                  @Nullable
                                  String toPath,
                                  @NonNull
                                  String... fromPaths)
                           throws IOException
        Copies all directories at the given fromPaths on the file system.

        This is a bulk operation for copyDirectory(int, FileFilter, FilenameFilter, String, String) method, so the given paths will be looped to perform the requested action for each of them.

        Parameters:
        fromPaths - Paths to the desired directories to be copied.
        Returns:

        IOException
